thread.title: Saluki Hall of Famer Gallatin Passes Away
thread.title_full: Saluki Hall of Famer Gallatin Passes Away

title: Saluki Hall of Famer Gallatin Passes Away
text:
Saluki Hall of Famer Gallatin Passes Away Tools 
Story Created: Oct 8, 2015 at 12:47 AM   8, 2015 at 1:03 AM CDT WSIL -- Former SIU basketball coach and Saluki hall of famer Harry Gallatin has passed away at the age of 88. Gallatin compiled a record of 79-35 while coaching the Salukis from 1959-62. He was inducted into the SIU Hall of Fame back in February. He played nine seasons for the New York Knicks and was a seven time NBA all-star. Gallatin is a member of Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame as well as six other Halls of Fame, including at sister school SIUE, where he led the Cougars golf program to 18 NCAA Division II championship appearances.
